ygData.subject: Re: Decepticons hit an run.
ygData.msgSnippet: Slag, this gonna hurt Beastbox Beastbox frantically grabs whatever he can from the inside of Firarm (Wires chips, you name it), moving his arms around

Subject: Re: Decepticons hit an run.

"Slag, this gonna hurt Beastbox" Beastbox frantically grabs whatever he can
from the inside of Firarm (Wires chips, you name it), moving his arms
around quickly, and as he notices the speed of the ground aproaching him,
he tries to jump out from underneath, ripping whatever he grabs. He tries
to use his feet (like hands because he is a gorrilla) and his hands to
stradle around to the top side of Firearm's tank mode.

OOC: Yanshosh, you go ahead and tell me if any of this works, okay.
